data.message: Lord the alt right trump supporters hating Eminem cause he called trump out. Of course he did a big fuck you to half his fanbase but come on lmao the guy has been irellivent for a while now and needed that hype for his album. IM A DIE HARD EMINEM FAN (CAPITALIZED SINCE YOU ALLL CANNOT READ) and wont let my politics get in the way of good music.(im a trump supporter)

replies.message: He's always been relevant lol. Never stopped making music.
To mainstream no. But to fans yes. Trust hes my favorite rapper. He will always be the best rapper tho.
If you're a white supremacist and you're a fan of any rapper you straight up don't get the point. Why call such a clueless individual a fan?
Nice one Deadpool but tell me again how is 4 millions albums sells worlwide and winning the grammy for best rap album with his lattest album (mmlp2) is being  not relevent?
Dude chill!!! He just isnt mainstream anymore.
Ask most people about eminem and they will wonder where he is at. Rather than if you ask a fan they know hes about to drop an album.
Again im a huge em fan so im not bashing him as some hater.
U support trump but u like all the people that sont like trump lol
Dude lmao because i have my own mind and opinions.

What type of logic is that? I agree with trump on some issues but not all. Because i like a person doesnt mean i have to switch my political views to what they like? Are you even independent in your own thoughts?
Drew Gal did you not realize i was bashing alt right trump supporters for basically riding his dick because they are hating on Eminem for hating trump?

Irrelevant? Look up Em in 2014. I could go on and on with the records he set. 2017 he is the 12 most streamed artist with no album in 4 years. He also just get a new record with 3 albums lasting 300 weeks on the Billboard 200. Less than 20 albums have lasted that long and he owns 3 now.
Donelle Schultz Lmao god damn again. I am a huge eminem fan. Ask most people where em was before that Trump dis and they would question. Ask fans they know where he is at.
Donelle Schultz capitalized it for ya 👌
